short_summary: Arctic Multibeam survey using Uncrewed Surface Vessel (USV)
description: This project is to conduct hydrographic surveys in specific priority areas of the eastern Canadian Arctic in direct support of the Canadian Hydrographic Service (CHS) Ontario, Prairie and Arctic Region Production Plan.  The objectives of the project are to collect high-resolution, full bottom coverage bathymetry, topographic data and tidal/current data via hydrographic surveys to produce new navigational products and datasets to create new or replace/augment existing navigational products in the target areas.

full_summary:
### 1. Solicitation Number and Title
**Solicitation Number**: 30004214
**Title**: Canadian Hydrographic Service - Arctic Multibeam Survey using Uncrewed Surface Vessel (USV)

### 2. Overview
The Canadian Hydrographic Service (CHS) invites bids for a hydrographic survey using an Uncrewed Surface Vessel (USV) in the eastern Canadian Arctic. The survey will take place between mid-August and the end of October 2023, with a preferred period from September 1 to October 12, subject to CHS Ship schedule.

### 3. Tender Brief
The objective of this project is to conduct hydrographic surveys in priority areas of the eastern Canadian Arctic, supporting the CHS's production plan for the Ontario, Prairie, and Arctic Region. High-resolution full bottom coverage bathymetry, topographic data, and tidal/current data will be collected to produce new navigational products and datasets.

The scope of work includes the mobilization of USV equipment by the Contractor, attending to the CHS Ship's southern mobilization port, and providing a launch and recovery system. The USV will be deployed and recovered by the CHS Ship nearby the target survey area(s). The Contractor will provide at least one technical representative to be on board the CHS Ship for the entire 42-day operational window.

### 4. Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria include the combined rating of technical merit and price, with the highest score winning the contract.

### 5. Closing Date and Time
The tender closing date and time are June 5 at 13:00 hours. Late submissions will not be accepted.

### 6. Key Dates
*   Tender closing date: June 5 at 13:00 hours
*   Expected contract start date: July 1, 2023
*   Expected contract end date: December 31, 2023
*   Survey period: Mid-August to the end of October 2023

### 7. Downloadable Documents
To access the tender documentation, please visit the following links:
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5289/30004214---solicitation-addendum-1---addenda---bilingual.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5289/30004214---rfp.pdf
